pr_title: WFCORE-4924: add plain-text option to security command

timeline.bodyText: Please move these back to the top and expand back so they are fully qualified.
timeline.author: darranl

replies.bodyText: Is this ok? The imports in the original are kinda all over the place.
replies.author: michpetrov

replies.bodyText: They do look a bit disorganised to begin with but all the static imports should be first in the import list so I think they should still move up.
replies.author: darranl
